title: System Design
desc: As I start building an application, I gather and document essential data to ensure the system is well-structured and on the right track.

title: UX & UI
desc: I focus on crafting intuitive and visually engaging user experiences by researching, designing, and refining interfaces to ensure seamless interaction and usability.

title: Web Application
desc: I develop dynamic and scalable web applications by designing, building, and optimizing systems to ensure functionality, performance, and a seamless user experience.

title: Upskilling & Learning
desc: I continuously expand my knowledge and refine my skills by exploring new technologies, improving workflows, and staying updated with industry trends.
